column5: Nestled on the South side of beautiful Canyon Lake, our home is waterfront with gorgeous views of the lake and Canyon Dam.   The home is a single story with an open floor plan. The bedroom is completely sequestered from the Master living area so you will enjoy your privacy.  You will enjoy quiet and peaceful nights with beautiful sunrises with your favorite morning beverage on the deck.   We look forward to hosting you in our home soon.  Glenn and Kaye
column8: Slice of Heaven on Canyon Lake
